rooms.description: A large open-plan area combining the living room and kitchen. It features a modern aesthetic with ample natural light and integrated smart appliances.
Spacious master bedroom located in the corner of the bungalow to enhance privacy and energy flow according to Vastu.
Second bedroom designed with ample natural light, ensuring a calm environment.
Third bedroom that follows modern design principles and provides comfortable space for guests or family members.
Dedicated servant's quarters with separate access to the main building. Designed to respect privacy and maintain a clear functional separation.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned on the corner plot for optimal light entry and security.
Secondary access door that connects to the swimming pool area and garden.
Large window placed on the east side of the living room and kitchen for enhanced natural light as per Vastu recommendations.
Designated entrance to the swimming pool area from the rear or side, ensuring safe and easy access without compromising privacy.
